data.text: “Tegeleza gweye ulanga, gano gonilonga,
Mafundizo gangu godwendweka kamba mvula,
Nodisimulila twaga da Mndewa Imulungu,
Mndewa Imulungu ayo Dibwe kulu da kuifisila,
Lakini mweye mswela kutamaniligwa kumwake,
Vino habali momuliha Mndewa Imulungu kamba avo,
Kumbukeni siku za umwaka,
Ayo yeli Uchanha Ng'hani viyawagwelele wanhu wa isi uhazi wao,
Lakini Mndewa Imulungu kaweka wanhu wa Yakobo wawe wake,
Kawona Waizilaeli owegela kuluwala,
Kamba mhungu yokaliza kisanza chake,
Mndewa Imulungu mwenyego kawalongoza,
Kawabitiza kuvigongo,
Kawagwaa mtindi na maziwa ga ng'ombe na mbuzi,
Wanhu wa Izilaeli waneneha na wavitowa mateke,
Wamtenda yakone migongo kwa imilungu yao
Wavilavila nhosa vinyamkela weli siyo Imulungu,
Mmuleka Dibwe yawagwelele ugima,
Mndewa Imulungu kayona mbuli ayo na kawaleka,
Kalonga, ‘Nokifisa kihanga changu,
Wanitenda nyone migongo kwa kinhu hakili imulungu,
Ng'hasiliki yangu yokwaka moto,
‘Nowagalila magayo hogomala,
Osoka kwa nzala,
Ng'hondo yogala ifa kudibuga,
Nahawabanange wose,
ila nidumba kuitapa kwa awo owehila,
Wanhu wa isi ya Izilaeli awo wanhu welibule nzewele,
Maza wakalile na nzewele wahajuwile habali wahumwa,
Munhu imoja kodaha vilihi kuwahuma wanhu elufu imoja
Hata iwanhu otwihila ojuwa kamba,
Kwavija mizabibu yao yolawa Sodoma,
Divai yao kamba sumu ya nyoka,
Vino, gano sigekile goya kumwangu,
Niye ayo yonda nilihe gehile,
Mndewa Imulungu kowagombela wanhu zake,
Abaho Mndewa Imulungu kowauza wanhu zake,
Yakwahi ayo imilungu idile sadaka zenu,
‘Loleni kamba niye ayo Imulungu,
Nogolosa mkono wangu kuulanga,
mwahajona sime jangu dimelemeta,
Misale yangu yokoligwa damu,
Mweye wanhu wa isi ziyagwe, wadeng'heleleni wanhu zake,
Musa na Yoshua, mwanage Nuni, weza kuulongozi wa iwanhu, Musa kazibwelela mbuli za lwila uno, avo Waizilaeli wose wauhulike.
Musa viyamambukize kuwalongela wanhu wa Izilaeli mbuli zino zose,
kawalongela, “Zikeni mmizoyo yenu mbuli zose ziniwagwelele lelo. Molondigwa muwalongele wanenu ili wazigoge kwa kutamaniligwa mbuli zose za malagizo gano.
Kwavija malagizo gano siyo mbuli ziiyeka ila ago ugima wenu, kubitila malagizo gano mokala siku nyingi mwiisi yumuchola kuisola, mwambu wa lwanda lwa Yolidani.”
Siku didijo Mndewa Imulungu kamulongela Musa,
“Kwela kulugongo luno lwa Abalimu, lugongo lwa Nebo mwiisi ya Moabu, mwambu kwa mwambu na buga da Yeliko, uilole isi ya Kanaani iniwagwelela Waizilaeli iwe yao.
Abaho kuko kulugongo kofa na koiting'hana na wahenga zako wafile mwaka kamba viyafile mkulu wako Haluni kulugongo lwa Holi na kaiting'hana na wahenga zake,
kwavija mweye wabili mubena lagizo jangu mgameso ga Waizilaeli. Vimukalile ako kugamazi ga Meliba behi na buga da Kadeshi kuna uluwala lwa Sini, hamungwelele ukulu mgameso ga iwanhu.
Avo koyona isi kwa kutali, lakini honda wingile bule mna iisi iniwagwelela wanhu wa Izilaeli.”
